title: Pixel 4a No LTE Connectivity
content: I am trying to use my pixel 4a on the GTA network in Guam.  My phone says I have  LTE connectivity in some blocks and no connection in others.  I can send and receive calls but I cannot use web sites over LTE.  I have verified that my phone supports the ISPs LTE bands (B4).  I have checked the SIMs data support in a second device (S8).  How do I fix this?
